      • getNewValue

        public static java.lang.Boolean getNewValue(java.lang.Boolean[][] board,
                                            int x,
                                            int y)
        Calculate the next generation of the specified cell.
        Parameters:
        board - Boolean 2D array of the current generation.
        x - X position of the cell to get the new value of in the 2D array.
        y - Y position of the cell to get the new value of in the 2D array.
        Returns:
        New state of the cell.
